title: Asynchronous Online Mathematics: Proportional Reasoning Intensive Master Class

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary arithmetic operations and understanding of fractional concepts
context.additional_context: Provides UX-based mathematics learning experiences optimized for individual device environments, with built-in structures for measuring learning outcomes for summative assessment.

learning_goals: Learners can apply the principles of interconversion between ratios, fractions, and percentages to solve proportional relationship problems with 85% accuracy.
Learners independently utilize proportional reasoning strategies in real-world contexts (e.g., discount rate calculations, map scales) with over 70% success.
Learners achieve an average accuracy rate of over 80% in interactive quizzes provided at 15-minute intervals during video lectures.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
